"John and his staff is very nice and his contractors are wonderful!"

We used Blessed Roofing for work after the big hail storm. They took our money, but they never completed the work. On various occasions we spoke with them about returning our money. Upon not hearing from them we filed in small claims court … More
Let John Collins do ur roof!!! Quality work!!!!  Blessed roofing company for all your roofing needs!!! Complete storm damage repair without all those contractors..just ask!  Have a blessed day...

In July 2024, my elderly mother—on a fixed income—paid nearly $12,000 upfront to The Blessed Roofing Company, owned by John Collins, trusting that he would repair her roof. He cashed her check immediately, but after that… nothing. … More
